channel.title: Replication on Richard Klein
channel.description: Recent content in Replication on Richard Klein

item.title: Many Labs 2 Under Review
item.description: EDIT:ML2 was published Dec 2018, open access in AMPPS. See also the commentaries from original authors. ORIGINAL: The Many Labs 2 project has been submitted and is under review at AMPPS. Overall, 28 psychology studies were replicated across >120 samples from 34 countries around the world, totalling >15,000 participants. Public release of the results/manuscript/data should occur shortly, pending final revisions and alongside commentaries from original authors.
